fail-reason.FAIL_02_FIELD_INVOICED_BLANK: Leave the invoice cell as blank?
fail-reason.FAIL_05_BAN_NOT_ALLOWED_WHEN_NPO_FILLED: Buyer GUI number cannot be included on the donation invoice
fail-reason.FAIL_08_BLANK_ORDER_PRODUCT_OR_PRODUCT_Q: Item cell is blank or product quantity is 0
fail-reason.FAIL_09_FIELD_AMOUNT_WRONG: Amount incorrect (cannot be matched with the product price)
fail-reason.FAIL_18_FILED_CREDIT_NO_WRONG: Final 4 digits on the credit card incorrect
fail-reason.FAIL_20_NO_BUYER_WHEN_FIELD_INVOICED_IS_: ECFIT electronic invoice is not used, therefore buyer information is not required
fail-reason.FAIL_42_STORE_PICK_UP_REQUIRE_CODE: Incomplete information for convenience store pick-up order
fail-reason.FAIL_43_CODE_NOT_ALLOWED_WHEN_NOT_STORE_: Convenience store information is not required for non-convenience store pick-up order
fail-reason.FAIL_03_ORDER_STATUS_WRONG_OR_NOT_ALLOWE: ECFIT order status error, therefore cancellation can not be executed

send-error.title: Unable to use ECFIT service
send-error.content: Configuration error. Please check again using the third-party configuration
